The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, in a post related to the border clashes between Indian and Chinese soldiers.
The Facebook post: s caption explicitly mentions that the photo shows Indian soldiers killed in the Indo-China faceoff at Galwan Valley and describes the mutilation of their face organs by PLA forces.
Through a reverse image search on Yandex: the photo was found to be previously published in 2015 in news reports about an attack on Nigerian soldiers by Boko Haram.
